deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"1b16a21aa346b2c79867910db63b33c86286b604","repoName":"KaunteyShah/credit-risk-analysis-tool","actor":"KaunteyShah","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Complete UI overhaul: EY branding, workflow fixes, and enhanced UX

✨ EY Branding Integration:
- Header changed to 'EY - Data Risk Modernisation - SIC Code Prediction System'
- Navbar background changed from blue to EY yellow (#ffe600)
- All text on yellow backgrounds now uses black for optimal contrast
- Card headers and modal headers updated to EY yellow theme

🔧 Workflow Visualization Improvements:
- Fixed arrow spacing to prevent touching workflow nodes
- Arrows positioned at right: -100px with 80px width for better visual balance
- Simplified progress bar animation to single smooth progression
- Eliminated dual-animation causing back-and-forth movement
- Progress bar now animates directly to completion (1200ms duration)

🎨 UI/UX Enhancements:
- Removed blue header box from 'Real Agent Prediction' section
- Creates more space and cleaner appearance
- Navigation tabs now use EY yellow accents
- Consistent black text throughout yellow-themed sections

📱 Technical Improvements:
- C"}
